Message.Title: MoneyPak PayPal and Ebay DEMAND SSN #, Pets Name, Phone #, Employer and Mother's Maiden Name to add Funds to Account????
Message.Msg: Tried adding funds to my PayPal account to buy small speakers on a site other than ebay, and was not allowed to fund account unless I gave all my personal data to MoneyPak before they accept the money. So I figure if I have to give all my personal data to questionable sites, what do I need MoneyPak or PayPal for...I can just use my own credit card and be done with it. I had $12 left in my PayPal account, so I figure ebay can keep that money...cause I no longer have a need for their services. Hoping that $12 raises the eps.
